--></style>
<div id="nytmm_elyriapromo" class="nytmm_lede">
<div class="nytmm_vidcol">
<div id="nytmm_elyria_still" style="width: 470px; height: 265px; position: absolute; top: -2px;" data-poster="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/images/us/20121012_ELYRIA/promos/day5-470.jpg" data-mp4="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/video/us/20121012_ELYRIA/promos/day5-511.mp4" data-ogv="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/video/us/20121012_ELYRIA/promos/day5_511.ogv" data-scale="true" data-mssg="View the Video Feature" data-link="http://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2012/10/14/us/this-land-elyria-ohio.html#/#resilient-reinvention"></div> 
</div><div class="credit">Nicole Bengiveno/The New York Times</div>
<div class="nytmm_promo_container">
<h6 class="kicker">This Land | Donna’s Diner</h6>
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/this-land-elyria-with-a-makeover-a-promise-to-keep-going.html">A Promise to Keep Going</a></h5>
<p class="byline">By DAN BARRY</p>
<p class="summary" style="width: 396px;">One constant in a struggling city like Elyria, Ohio, is the shared determination to make it through this day and into the next.</p>
<ul class="refer">
<li>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2012/10/14/us/this-land-elyria-ohio.html#/#resilient-reinvention" class="icon video"> View the Video Feature »</a> | <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/this-land-elyria-with-a-makeover-a-promise-to-keep-going.html#postcomment"><img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="Comment" width="9" height="11" border="0"> Post a Comment</a>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<script src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/js/multimedia/libs/jquery-1.7.1.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/js/multimedia/bundles/projects/2012/ElyriaDinerPromo.js"></script>
</div>	<div style="display:none;">	<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">This Land | Donna's Diner</h6>
<h1><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/this-land-elyria-with-a-makeover-a-promise-to-keep-going.html?hp">
With a New Menu and a Makeover, a Promise to Keep Going</a></h1>
<h6 class="byline">
By DAN BARRY        <span class="timestamp">9:11 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
One constant in a struggling city like Elyria, Ohio, is the shared determination to make it through this day and into the next.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li style="background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;"><img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="comment icon" style="margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border="0"><span class="commentCountLink" articleid="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/this-land-elyria-with-a-makeover-a-promise-to-keep-going.html" overflowurl="http://community.nytimes.com/comments/www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/this-land-elyria-with-a-makeover-a-promise-to-keep-going.html"></span></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>	<div class="doubleRuleDivider"></div> 
</div><!--end div.columnGroup -->
</div><!--end #spanABTopRegion -->
<!--start lede package -->        
<div class="wideB module">
<div class="aColumn opening">
<div class="columnGroup first">				
<div style="margin:0 0 4px 0;"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/politics/index.html?hp"><img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/headers/election2012/hdr_election2012_163.gif" alt="Election 2012" /></a></div>	<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">News Analysis</h6>
<h2><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html?hp">
Debating Over Last Term, Candidates Say Little of Next</a></h2>
<h6 class="byline">
By PETER BAKER        <span class="timestamp">7:58 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
The candidates for president and vice president have focused in the debates more on the last four years than on plans for the future.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li style="background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;"><img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="comment icon" style="margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border="0"><span class="commentCountLink" articleid="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html" overflowurl="http://community.nytimes.com/comments/www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html#postcomment">Post a Comment</a> | <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html#commentsContainer">Read (43)</a></span></li>
</ul>
</div>	</div>
<div class="columnGroup ">				
<div class="story">
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/campaigns-raise-focus-on-women-for-final-weeks.html?hp">
Campaigns Raise Focus on Women</a></h3>
<p class="summary">
The final push for votes is coming down to a fight for the allegiance of vital demographic groups.    </p>
</div>	<div class="story">
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html?hp">
Bloomberg Starts a ‘Super PAC’</a></h3>
<p class="summary">
Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York will back candidates of both parties in races nationwide.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li style="background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;">
<img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="comment icon" style="margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border="0" /><span class="commentCountLink" articleid="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html" overflowurl="http://community.nytimes.com/comments/www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html"></span>
</li></ul>
</div>	</div>
<div class="columnGroup last">				
<div style="display:none;">	<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">News Analysis</h6>
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html?hp">
Debating Over Last Term, Candidates Say Little of Next</a></h3>
<h6 class="byline">
By PETER BAKER        <span class="timestamp">7:58 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
The candidates for president and vice president have focused in the debates more on the last four years than on plans for the future.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li style="background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;"><img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="comment icon" style="margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border="0"><span class="commentCountLink" articleid="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html" overflowurl="http://community.nytimes.com/comments/www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/debates-have-not-clarified-matters-for-voters-news-analysis.html"></span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="story">
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/campaigns-raise-focus-on-women-for-final-weeks.html?hp">
Campaigns Raise Focus on Women</a></h3>
<h6 class="byline">
By JIM RUTENBERG and JEREMY W. PETERS        <span class="timestamp">10:01 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
With Election Day looming, the push for votes is coming down to a fight for the allegiance of vital demographic groups.    </p>
</div>
<div class="story">
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html?hp">
Bloomberg Starts ‘Super PAC’</a></h3>
<h6 class="byline">
By RAYMOND HERNANDEZ        <span class="timestamp"></span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York will back candidates in close races who support his biggest policy initiatives.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li style="background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;"><img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="comment icon" style="margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border="0"><span class="commentCountLink" articleid="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html" overflowurl="http://community.nytimes.com/comments/www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/bloomberg-forming-super-pac-to-influence-2012-races.html"></span></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>	</div>
</div><!--close aColumn -->

<div id="photoSpotRegion">
<div class="columnGroup first">

<div class="columnGroup first">				
<div class = "story">
<h5><a href = "http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/world/americas/colombia-tries-again-to-end-drug-fed-war.html?hp">
Colombia Tries Again to End Drug-Fed War</a></h5>
<div class = "thumbnail runaroundRight" style = "margin-top: 4px">
<a href = "http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/world/americas/colombia-tries-again-to-end-drug-fed-war.html?hp">
<img src = "http://i1.nyt.com/images/2012/10/18/world/colombia1/colombia1-thumbStandard.jpg" width = "75" 
            height = "75" 
            alt = "In Toribío, in the Cauca region, where guerrillas are defending drug routes, security is high and gunfire is common. Many buildings still show bomb damage." border = "0" />
</a>
</div>
<h6 class = "byline">
By WILLIAM NEUMAN        <span class="timestamp">8:09 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
As new talks with the government begin, drug profits may be too rich for many in the armed group known as FARC to abandon for the sake of peace.    </p>
<ul class = "refer">
<li style = "background-image: none; padding-left: 0pt;">
<img src = "http://i1.nyt.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif"
                            alt = "comment icon" style = "margin-right: 3px; padding-top: 3px;" border = "0">
<span class = "commentCountLink" articleid = "http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/world/americas/colombia-tries-again-to-end-drug-fed-war.html" 
                                overflowurl = "http://community.nytimes.com/article/comments/2012/10/18/world/americas/colombia-tries-again-to-end-drug-fed-war.html"></span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>	</div>
<div class="columnGroup ">				
<div class="story">
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/business/to-fight-prescription-painkiller-abuse-dea-targets-distributors.html?hp">
Painkiller Crackdown Targets U.S. Distributors</a></h5>
<h6 class="byline">
By BARRY MEIER        <span class="timestamp"></span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
In a new approach on painkiller abuse, the government is focusing on middlemen between makers and dispensers.    </p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnGroup ">				
<div class = "story">
<h5><a href = "http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/mormons-and-scouts-act-as-partners-in-molding-boys.html?hp">
Mormons and Scouts, in Tandem, Turn Boys to Men</a></h5>
<div class = "thumbnail runaroundRight" style = "margin-top: 4px">
<a href = "http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/mormons-and-scouts-act-as-partners-in-molding-boys.html?hp">
<img src = "http://i1.nyt.com/images/2012/10/18/us/MORMONS1/MORMONS1-thumbStandard.jpg" width = "75" 
            height = "75" 
            alt = "Boy Scouts in Cedar Hills, Utah, preparing to march their flags into the room where Troop 1194 meets. The Mormon Church considers the Boy Scouts a complement to its spiritual training of boys." border = "0" />
</a>
</div>
<h6 class = "byline">
By ERIK ECKHOLM        <span class="timestamp">9:15 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
The Mormon Church gives the Boy Scouts a central role in preparing male youths for missionary stints and life as lay priests, and the relationship is a boon to scouting.    </p>
</div>	</div>
<div class="columnGroup ">				
<div class="story">
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/nyregion/gillibrand-and-long-clash-in-debate-for-us-senate.html?hp">
In New York, Senate Rivals Don’t Agree on Much</a></h5>
<h6 class="byline">
By THOMAS KAPLAN        <span class="timestamp">10:20 PM ET</span>
</h6>
<p class="summary">
Wendy E. Long, a Republican, and United States Senator Kirsten E. Gillibrand held their sole debate on Wednesday.    </p>
</div>
</div>

<div id="pocketRegion" class="module">
<div class="columnGroup first">				
<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">Talk to The Times</h6>
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/business/media/jill-abramson-executive-editor-answers-questions.html?hp">
Readers’ Questions for Jill Abramson, Executive Editor</a></h5>
<h6 class="byline">
</h6>
<div class="thumbnail">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/business/media/jill-abramson-executive-editor-answers-questions.html?hp">
<img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/2011/06/03/business/media/03abramson/03abramson-thumbStandard.jpg" width="75" height="75" alt="Jill Abramson" border="0" />
</a>
</div>
<p class="summary">
Ms. Abramson answered questions about anonymous sources, comments on articles and more during an online forum Wednesday, which will resume Thursday.    </p>
<ul class="refer">
<li><a href=" http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/business/media/jill-abramson-executive-editor-answers-questions.html"><img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/icons/multimedia/comment_icon.gif" alt="Comment" width="9" height="11" border="0"> Ask a Question</a> | <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/business/media/jill-abramson-executive-editor-answers-questions.html#answers">Answers</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="columnGroup first">

</script>
<style>
    .opinionModule { margin-top: 5px; }
</style>	<div class="opinionModule">
<h4 class="sectionHeaderHome"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/opinion/index.html"><img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/opinion/homepage/opinionPagesHpC337.png" /></a>
</h4>
<div class="subColumn-2 wrap layout ">
<div class="column">
<div class="insetH">
<div class="story">
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/vladimir-putins-gift-to-terrorists.html">Editorial: Mr. Putin’s Gift to Terrorists</a>
</h5>
<p class="summary flushBottom">Russia is putting the world at risk by refusing American aid to clean up its nuclear
weapon sites.</p>
</div>
<div class="story">
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/in-the-debates-interruption-or-interjection.html">Op-Ed: Would You Please Let Me Finish ...</a>
</h5>
<div class="thumbnail"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/in-the-debates-interruption-or-interjection.html"><img src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/2012/10/18/opinion/1018OPEDoops/1018OPEDoops-thumbStandard.jpg" height="50" width="50" /></a>
</div>
<p class="summary flushBottom">Ideas vary widely about what constitutes interruptions.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="column lastColumn">
<div class="insetH">
<h6 class="kicker">Op-Ed Columnists</h6>
<ul class="headlinesOnly">
<li><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/kristof-scotts-story-and-the-election.html">Kristof: Scott’s Story </a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/collins-women-and-the-men-who-yell.html">Collins: Women Voters</a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://campaignstops.blogs.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/blunders-and-binders/">Blow: Blunders, Binders</a>
</li>
</ul>
<h6 class="kicker">More in Opinion</h6>
<ul class="headlinesOnly">
<li><a href="http://opinionator.blogs.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/reaping-the-whirlwind/">Greenhouse: Affirmative Action </a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/mr-romneys-version-of-equal-rights.html">Editorial: Mr. Romney’s Version of Equal Rights</a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/opinion/chinas-nobels.html">Op-Ed: China’s Nobels</a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/roomfordebate/2012/10/17/should-industry-face-more-cybersecurity-mandates">Room for Debate: Bracing Businesses for Cyber War</a>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>	<div class="singleRuleDivider"></div>	</div>
</div><!--close cColumnTopSpanRegion -->


<div class="columnGroup first">

      var doc  = document.getElementsByTagName('head').item(0);

      wsod.setAttribute('language','javascript');
      wsod.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');
      wsod.setAttribute('src',file+rnd);
      doc.appendChild(wsod);
    }

<div class="column">
<div class="columnGroup flushBottom">	<h4 class="sectionHeaderHome"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/technology/personaltech/index.html?src=dayp">Personal Tech »</a></h4>
<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">State of the Art</h6>
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/technology/personaltech/drobo-offers-raid-array-systems-to-back-up-top-heavy-files-review.html?src=dayp">
An Easy Way to Back Up, but It Costs
</a></h5>
<div class="runaroundRight">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/technology/personaltech/drobo-offers-raid-array-systems-to-back-up-top-heavy-files-review.html?src=dayp">
<img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2012/10/18/business/POGUE/POGUE-thumbStandard.jpg" alt="
An Easy Way to Back Up, but It Costs" width="75" height="75" />
</a></div>
<p class="summary">
Are your noncorporate drives increasingly stuffed with data and not backed up? Drobo offers two systems intended to save all your files when drive death occurs.
</p>
</div>
<!--end of first daypart promo code, don't touch the column code below -->
</div></div><div class="column lastColumn"><div class="columnGroup flushBottom"><h4 class="sectionHeaderHome"> </h4>
<!--- insert second daypart promo below -->
<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">Tool Kit</h6>
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/technology/personaltech/is-it-time-to-upgrade-your-gadgets-do-the-math.html?src=dayp">
Knowing When It Pays to Upgrade Your Gadgets
</a></h5>
<p class="summary">
Replacing a broken device makes sense. Abandoning one that works for a newer model is a tougher choice.
</p>
</div>	<div id="Middle5"><!-- ADXINFO classification="HPAdvantage_163x90" campaign="nyt2012-digi-giftoffer-163x90-hp-39Y6L"--><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/adx/bin/adx_click.html?type=goto&opzn&page=homepage.nytimes.com/index.html&pos=Middle5&sn2=1523368c/d15e58cc&sn1=1438c83b/62118e01&camp=nyt2012-digi-giftoffer-163x90-hp-39Y6L&ad=digi-subs-giftoffer-163x90-39Y6L&goto=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Enytimes%2Ecom%2Fsubscriptions%2FMultiproduct%2Flp4021%2Ehtml%3Fadxc%3D186326%26adxa%3D300226%26page%3Dhomepage.nytimes.com/index.html%26pos%3DMiddle5%26campaignId%3D39Y6L" target="_blank">

</div>
</div>

</a></h5>

<div class="tabContent" id="autos">
<div class="editColumn">	<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/14/automobiles/after-romping-in-mud-you-can-take-it-for-a-bath.html?hp">
After Romping in the Mud, You Can Take It for a Bath
</a></h5>
<div class="runaroundRight">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/14/automobiles/after-romping-in-mud-you-can-take-it-for-a-bath.html?hp">
<img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2012/10/14/automobiles/14QUAD2/14QUAD2-thumbStandard.jpg" alt="After Romping in the Mud, You Can Take It for a Bath" width="75" height="75" />
</a></div>
<p class="summary">
The Gibbs Quadski is a machine easily mistaken for an all-terrain vehicle, but it’s built to go places that A.T.V.’s won’t, like across a lake.
</p>	</div>

<div class="story advertisement">
<div class="callout">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/adx/bin/adx_click.html?type=goto&opzn&page=homepage.nytimes.com/index.html&pos=HPmodule-RE2&sn2=d1cdc681/5274a2cb&sn1=22cfc389/7694b58f&camp=hpmodRE-Manhattan_House_1825732-cla&ad=9.13.12-ManhattanHouse-173x98-HPM&goto=http%3A%2F%2Fbs%2Eserving%2Dsys%2Ecom%2FBurstingPipe%2FadServer%2Ebs%3Fcn%3Dtf%26c%3D20%26mc%3Dclick%26pli%3D5429738%26PluID%3D0%26ord%3D2012.10.18.04.54.16" target="_blank">
<img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/adx/images/ADS/31/13/ad.311382/C1204-Living-Room.gif" width="173" height="98" border="0" alt="Click for Details"></a>
</div>
<h5>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/adx/bin/adx_click.html?type=goto&opzn&page=homepage.nytimes.com/index.html&pos=HPmodule-RE2&sn2=d1cdc681/5274a2cb&sn1=22cfc389/7694b58f&camp=hpmodRE-Manhattan_House_1825732-cla&ad=9.13.12-ManhattanHouse-173x98-HPM&goto=http%3A%2F%2Fbs%2Eserving%2Dsys%2Ecom%2FBurstingPipe%2FadServer%2Ebs%3Fcn%3Dtf%26c%3D20%26mc%3Dclick%26pli%3D5429738%26PluID%3D0%26ord%3D2012.10.18.04.54.16" target="_blank"></a>
</h5>
<p class="summary"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/adx/bin/adx_click.html?type=goto&opzn&page=homepage.nytimes.com/index.html&pos=HPmodule-RE2&sn2=d1cdc681/5274a2cb&sn1=22cfc389/7694b58f&camp=hpmodRE-Manhattan_House_1825732-cla&ad=9.13.12-ManhattanHouse-173x98-HPM&goto=http%3A%2F%2Fbs%2Eserving%2Dsys%2Ecom%2FBurstingPipe%2FadServer%2Ebs%3Fcn%3Dtf%26c%3D20%26mc%3Dclick%26pli%3D5429738%26PluID%3D0%26ord%3D2012.10.18.04.54.16" target="_blank">1-5 BR Condos<br>from $1.17M<br>Spacious. Sophisticated.<br>Timeless.</a>
</p>
<div class="adCreative">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/adx/bin/adx_click.html?type=goto&opzn&page=homepage.nytimes.com/index.html&pos=HPmodule-RE2&sn2=d1cdc681/5274a2cb&sn1=22cfc389/7694b58f&camp=hpmodRE-Manhattan_House_1825732-cla&ad=9.13.12-ManhattanHouse-173x98-HPM&goto=http%3A%2F%2Fbs%2Eserving%2Dsys%2Ecom%2FBurstingPipe%2FadServer%2Ebs%3Fcn%3Dtf%26c%3D20%26mc%3Dclick%26pli%3D5429738%26PluID%3D0%26ord%3D2012.10.18.04.54.16" target="_blank">

<div class="tabContent" id="jobMarket">
<h3 class="sectionHeader"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/monster"><img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/section/jobs/200703/cobrandHeader_315x20.gif" width="315" height="20" alt="NYTimes.com / Monster" /></a></h3>
<div class="editColumn">	<h6 class="kicker">Corner Office</h6>
<h5><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/14/business/christopher-nassetta-of-hilton-on-focusing-its-values.html">
On a Busy Road, a Company Needs Guardrails
</a></h5>
<div class="runaroundRight">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/14/business/christopher-nassetta-of-hilton-on-focusing-its-values.html">
<img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2012/10/14/business/14-CORNER-SUB/14-CORNER-SUB-thumbStandard.jpg" alt="
On a Busy Road, a Company Needs Guardrails" width="75" height="75" />
</a></div>
<p class="summary">
Christopher J. Nassetta, who found at least 30 different value statements when he arrived at Hilton Worldwide, says he has worked to align the company’s vision.
</p>	</div>
<div class="searchColumn">
<p style="font:bold 1.1em Arial; margin:0 0 10px 0">Find the best job in the New York metro area and beyond.</p>
<form class="searchForm" action="http://nytimes.monster.com/Search.aspx" method="get" name="advJobsearchForm">
<input type="hidden" name="cy" value="us" />
<input id="searchQuery" name="q" value="" />    
<input id="searchSubmit" title="Search" alt="Search" type="image" src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/global/global_search/search_button40x19.gif">  <a class="refer" href="http://jobmarket.nytimes.com/jobs/search-jobs/">Advanced Search »</a> 
</form>
</div>

<div class="singleAd" id="HPMiddle3">

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
// rev6_GoogleHP.html.new
<!--
function cs(){window.status='';}function ha(a){  pha=document.getElementById(a); nhi=pha.href.indexOf("&nh=");if(nhi < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nh=1";} pha.href=phb;}function ca(a) {  pha=document.getElementById(a); nci=pha.href.indexOf("&nc=");if(nci < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nc=1";} pha.href=phb;window.open(document.getElementById(a).href);}function ga(o,e) {if (document.getElementById) {a=o.id.substring(1);p = "";r = "";g = e.target;if (g) {t = g.id;f = g.parentNode;if (f) {p = f.id;h = f.parentNode;if (h)r = h.id;}} else {h = e.srcElement;f = h.parentNode;if (f)p = f.id;t = h.id;}if (t==a || p==a || r==a)return true;pha=document.getElementById(a); nbi=pha.href.indexOf("&nb=");if(nbi < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nb=1";} pha.href=phb;window.open(document.getElementById(a).href);}}



function google_ad_request_done(ads) {
	var s = "";

	if (ads.length == 0) {
		return;
	} else if (ads.length == 1 && ads[0].type != 'image') {
		google_ad_section_line_height = "22px";
		google_ad_section_padding_left = "12px";
		google_title_link_font_size = "18px";
		google_ad_text_font_size = "14px";
		google_visible_url_font_size = "14px";
		google_target_div = 'HPMiddle3';
	} else if (ads[0].type != 'image') {
		google_ad_section_line_height = "14px";
		google_ad_section_padding_left = "7px";
		google_title_link_font_size = "12px";
		google_ad_text_font_size = "11px";
		google_visible_url_font_size = "10px";
		google_target_div = 'HPMiddle3';
	}
	s += '<table width="100%" height="" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width:100%; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; border-color: #9da3ad" >\n<tr>\n<td style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" valign="top"><table width="100%" height="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="width:100%; height:100%;">\n<tr>\n <td style="background-color:#9da3ad; width:70%; height:20px; padding-top:2px; padding-left:11px; padding-bottom:2px; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" width="70%" height="20" bgcolor="#9da3ad" ><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; color:#ffffff;" >Ads by Google</span></td>\n<td style="padding-top:2px; padding-bottom:2px; width:30%; height:20px; align:right; background-color:#9da3ad; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" width="30%" height="20" align="right" bgcolor="#9da3ad" ><span><a style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; color: white; font-size:12px; padding-right:7px;" href="http://www.nytimes.com/ref/membercenter/faq/linkingqa16.html" onclick="window.open(\'\',\'popupad\',\'left=100,top=100,width=390,height=390,resizable,scrollbars=no\')" target="popupad">what\'s this?</a></span></td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td style="height:110px; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" valign="top" height="110"><table height="100%" width="100%" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="0" bgcolor="#f8f8f9" style="height:100%; width:100%; padding:4px; background-color:#f8f8f9;">\n';
	for (i = 0; i < ads.length; ++i) {
	   s += '<tr>\n<td style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333; background-color:#f8f8f9;" valign="middle" >\n<div style="line-height:' + google_ad_section_line_height + '; padding-left:' + google_ad_section_padding_left + '; padding-bottom:5px;" >\n<a href="' + ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" style="font-size:' + google_title_link_font_size + '; color:#000066; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:underline;"> ' + ads[i].line1 + '</a><br>\n' + ads[i].line2 + ' ' + ads[i].line3 + '<br>\n<a href="' + ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" style="font-size:' + google_visible_url_font_size + '; color:#000066; font-weight:normal; text-decoration:none;">' + ads[i].visible_url + '</a>\n</div>\n </td>\n</tr>\n';
	}
	s += '</table>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</table>';
	document.getElementById(google_target_div).innerHTML = s;
	return;
}
google_ad_output = 'js';
google_max_num_ads = '3';
google_ad_client = 'ca-nytimes_homepage_js';
google_safe = 'high';
google_ad_channel = 'test1';
google_targeting = 'content';
if (window.nyt_google_count) { google_skip = nyt_google_count; }
google_ad_section = 'default';
google_hints = 'business news online,us news online,online us news,top online news,business international news,online latest news';
// -->
</script>

</h6>
<div class="mothImage">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/dining/reviews/restaurant-review-blanca-in-bushwick.html"><span class="img" src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/2012/10/17/dining/17MOTH_REST/17MOTH_REST-moth-v2.jpg" alt="Restaurant Review: Blanca in Bushwick" width="151" height="151" /></a>
</div>
<h6 class="headline"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/dining/reviews/restaurant-review-blanca-in-bushwick.html">Restaurant Review: Blanca in Bushwick</a></h6>
</div>
</td>
<td class="hidden">
<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/opinion/index.html">Opinion »</a></h6>
<h3><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/17/opinion/dominique-strauss-kahn-and-libertinisms-sordid-history.html">Op-Ed: Free to Be a Sexual Predator?</a></h3>
<p class="summary">Dominique Strauss-Kahn’s life compares to the man whose name became a synonym for libertinism, Giacomo Casanova.</p>
</div>
</td>
<td class="hidden">
<div class="story">
<h6 class="kicker">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/national/index.html">U.S. &raquo;</a>
</h6>
<div class="mothImage">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/16/booming/in-a-time-of-hidden-crisis-president-visits-main-street.html"><span class="img" src="http://i1.nyt.com/images/2012/10/17/us/17moth_booming/17moth_booming-moth.jpg" alt="Booming: President Visits Main Street" width="151" height="151" /></a>
</div>
<h6 class="headline"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/16/booming/in-a-time-of-hidden-crisis-president-visits-main-street.html">Booming: President Visits Main Street</a></h6>
</div>

class="lastItem"><h6><a  href="http://www.nytimes.com/2012/10/18/us/politics/college-costs-test-obamas-education-policies.html?hpw">Rising College Costs Pose Test for Obama on Education Policies</a></h6></li></ul></div><div class="column"><h6 class="moduleHeaderLg"><a href="http://www.nytimes.com/pages/garden/index.html">Home & Garden &raquo;</a></h6><ul class="headlinesOnly"><li </div><script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript" src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/js/app/lib/NYTD/0.0.1/tabset.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
        
        (function(){
            var tabbedModule = NYTD.TabSet("blogModule");
            var date         = new Date();

            if(date.getMinutes() > 30) {
                $$("#blogModule ul.tabs li.selected").invoke("removeClassName", "selected");
                $$("#blogModule div.active").invoke("removeClassName", "active");
                tabbedModule.activateTab(tabbedModule.getTabs()[1], tabbedModule.getTabContent()[1]);
            }
        })()
        
    </script>

// rev6_GoogleHP.html.new

function cs(){window.status='';}function ha(a){  pha=document.getElementById(a); nhi=pha.href.indexOf("&nh=");if(nhi < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nh=1";} pha.href=phb;}function ca(a) {  pha=document.getElementById(a); nci=pha.href.indexOf("&nc=");if(nci < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nc=1";} pha.href=phb;window.open(document.getElementById(a).href);}function ga(o,e) {if (document.getElementById) {a=o.id.substring(1);p = "";r = "";g = e.target;if (g) {t = g.id;f = g.parentNode;if (f) {p = f.id;h = f.parentNode;if (h)r = h.id;}} else {h = e.srcElement;f = h.parentNode;if (f)p = f.id;t = h.id;}if (t==a || p==a || r==a)return true;pha=document.getElementById(a); nbi=pha.href.indexOf("&nb=");if(nbi < 1) {phb=pha.href+"&nb=1";} pha.href=phb;window.open(document.getElementById(a).href);}}

function randHPWell() {
	var wells = new Array("hpwell_travel","hpwell_automobiles");
	var ar_id = wells[Math.floor(Math.random()*wells.length)]+parseInt(1+Math.floor(Math.random()*3));
	if (document.getElementById(ar_id)) { return document.getElementById(ar_id).href; } else { return "http://www.nytimes.com";}
}

function google_ad_request_done(ads) {
	var s = "";

	if (ads.length == 0) {
		return;
	} else if (ads.length == 1 && ads[0].type != 'image') {
		google_ad_section_line_height = "22px";
		google_ad_section_padding_left = "12px";
		google_title_link_font_size = "18px";
		google_ad_text_font_size = "14px";
		google_visible_url_font_size = "14px";
		google_target_div = 'SponLinkHP';
	} else if (ads[0].type != 'image') {
		google_ad_section_line_height = "14px";
		google_ad_section_padding_left = "7px";
		google_title_link_font_size = "12px";
		google_ad_text_font_size = "11px";
		google_visible_url_font_size = "10px";
		google_target_div = 'SponLinkHP';
	}
	s += '<table width="100%" height="" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width:100%; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; border-color: #9da3ad" >\n<tr>\n<td style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" valign="top"><table width="100%" height="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="width:100%; height:100%;">\n<tr>\n <td style="background-color:#9da3ad; width:70%; height:20px; padding-top:2px; padding-left:11px; padding-bottom:2px; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" width="70%" height="20" bgcolor="#9da3ad" ><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; color:#ffffff;" >Ads by Google</span></td>\n<td style="padding-top:2px; padding-bottom:2px; width:30%; height:20px; align:right; background-color:#9da3ad; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" width="30%" height="20" align="right" bgcolor="#9da3ad" ><span><a style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; color: white; font-size:12px; padding-right:7px;" href="http://www.nytimes.com/ref/membercenter/faq/linkingqa16.html" onclick="window.open(\'\',\'popupad\',\'left=100,top=100,width=390,height=390,resizable,scrollbars=no\')" target="popupad">what\'s this?</a></span></td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td style="height:110px; font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333;" valign="top" height="110"><table height="100%" width="100%" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="0" bgcolor="#f8f8f9" style="height:100%; width:100%; padding:4px; background-color:#f8f8f9;">\n';
	for (i = 0; i < ads.length; ++i) {
	   s += '<tr>\n<td style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size:12px; color:#333333; background-color:#f8f8f9;" valign="middle" >\n<div style="line-height:' + google_ad_section_line_height + '; padding-left:' + google_ad_section_padding_left + '; padding-bottom:5px;" >\n<a href="' + ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" style="font-size:' + google_title_link_font_size + '; color:#000066; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:underline;"> ' + ads[i].line1 + '</a><br>\n' + ads[i].line2 + ' ' + ads[i].line3 + '<br>\n<a href="' + ads[i].url + '" target="_blank" style="font-size:' + google_visible_url_font_size + '; color:#000066; font-weight:normal; text-decoration:none;">' + ads[i].visible_url + '</a>\n</div>\n </td>\n</tr>\n';
	}
	s += '</table>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</table>';
	document.getElementById(google_target_div).innerHTML = s;
	return;
}
google_ad_output = 'js';
google_max_num_ads = '3';
google_ad_client = 'ca-nytimes_homepage_js';
google_safe = 'high';
google_ad_channel = 'pg_url_test';
google_targeting = 'content';
if (window.nyt_google_count) { google_skip = nyt_google_count; }
google_ad_section = 'default';
google_hints = 'business news online,us news online,online us news,top online news,business international news,online latest news';
// -->
</script>

652\/Wild-With-Happy\/overview":{"count":0,"commentsEnabled":true,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/theater.nytimes.com\/show\/74652\/Wild-With-Happy\/overview"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/16\/business\/economy\/alvin-roth-and-lloyd-shapley-win-nobel-in-economic-science.html":{"count":90,"commentsEnabled":false,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/16\/business\/economy\/alvin-roth-and-lloyd-shapley-win-nobel-in-economic-science.html"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/roomfordebate\/2012\/10\/14\/imagine-a-campaign-with-no-polls\/acknowledge-the-limits-of-prediction":{"count":3,"commentsEnabled":true,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/roomfordebate\/2012\/10\/14\/imagine-a-campaign-with-no-polls\/acknowledge-the-limits-of-prediction"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/nyregion\/new-york-republican-candidates-embrace-cuomos-crossover-appeal.html":{"count":26,"commentsEnabled":false,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/nyregion\/new-york-republican-candidates-embrace-cuomos-crossover-appeal.html"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/business\/with-profits-dropping-high-speed-trading-cools-down.html":{"count":50,"commentsEnabled":false,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/business\/with-profits-dropping-high-speed-trading-cools-down.html"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/us\/politics\/a-serious-debate-prep-session-for-obama.html":{"count":323,"commentsEnabled":false,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/15\/us\/politics\/a-serious-debate-prep-session-for-obama.html"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/18\/booming\/i-was-misinformed-the-breakup-bed.html":{"count":69,"commentsEnabled":true,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/2012\/10\/18\/booming\/i-was-misinformed-the-breakup-bed.html"},"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/roomfordebate\/2012\/10\/14\/imagine-a-campaign-with-no-polls\/polls-make-our-voices-heard-before-we-vote":{"count":12,"commentsEnabled":true,"assetUrl":"http:\/\/www.nytimes.com\/roomfordebat
